content.detailedDescription:
I was driving sout on a country road between the towns of belvidere & rockford illinois. i noticed a bright light in the sky. at first thought it to be atop a tower, but then realized there were no towers in that area so i began to look at it.
it looked like a very bright star. suddenly a ray of light (widening as it lengthened) emmerged from the star-like object. it only projected out a short distance. as it stopped projecting out, the end of this ray (at its widest & furthest point) turned to smoke, or a fog of some kind. the fog grew in size until it concealed everything (i.E. the ray & bright star-like object). then it was gone. the strange thing was right after it disappeared i started to feel real sleepy..Dreamy...Only for a second or two. i immediately had the feeling someone was trying to make me believe i had halucinated the whole thing...Who knows, maybe i did.
content.summary: Big bright  star-suddenly emmitted a short ray of light-smoke gathered at end of ray-engulfed object-vanished

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home with my older sister, and i had just finished a report for school, when i got up to take the trash out.

when i was out i wanted to see if i could still spot the moon, because of the time, the moon was about ready to be replaced by the sun. i was in my front yard and i saw where the sun was comming from, but i thought it funny because it was still dark in front of my house, but behind my house it was a little bright because of the sun, what made me notice the object, was the fact that it was brighter in the dark part of the sky.

at first glance i thought it was an airplane, but it was too early in the morning for flights, then i thought it was a blimp, but i have not seen a blimp since the early 1990s and because of the time.

the object was far away, but close enough for me to spot in the sky, at first it was just sitting there, but when i got my camara and a photo it started moving very slightly.

my first reaction to the sighting was "what the hell is that thing in the sky?!" i had called my sister outside to look at what i saw and her reaction was very much the same.

i did not lose sight of the object until the sun came up, and it seemed as though the object disappeared.
content.summary: Unknown flying object

content.detailedDescription: I was in the car with my dad and we were driving back to my grandma's house. we were listening to music at the time. then, my dad pointed out a strange object above two towers. i thought the object was a tower when i first glanced at it. the object wasn't any tower, because the object was oval shaped and amber colored with a reddish tint. it just sat there in the sky. so i went to get my ipod again to see if it did anything weird like the last time, but as soon as i turned around it was gone. my reaction was pretty stunned and we talked about it for awile. we lost sight of the object when it disappeared. my dad said he went over there a few days ago and said that where the object was (in between the towers) that there's nothing there.
content.summary: Strange light above two towers

content.detailedDescription: I was on a hike with my bsa troop and we stopped at a cliff to have lunch...I took some pictures..I didnt notice the ufo till i came home and was looking at them.Thought maybee could be a bird..
content.summary: Odd shape over park didnt notice till after

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were standing on our front porch when i noticed a bright light in the sky moving quickly to the east.....I pointed it out to my wife and and she immediately saw it.....The craft(?) made no noise and was out of sight in under four seconds.......It was flying low and appeared to be heading downward....The houses acroos the street blocked further view......The craft had red and blue lights and was surrounded by a white glow....
content.summary: We saw craft(?) moving quickly in an easterly direction low over town

content.detailedDescription: My mother first saw this out of her bedroom window..We've seen strange lights off and on for years...We now look for them..At first i thought it was the moon..But it kept "flashing" in brillance..It might even have been two objects in tandem..I watched it flare up in brillance at least twice and then fade out so that it almost disappeared.Since we have spotted these.. it was not scarey just very interesting..It finally just faded from sight...Would be interested to know if anyone else spotted this...
content.summary: Bright bright white yellow light...

content.detailedDescription:
1.5ea.Family members were sitting outside due to the summer heat and enjoying the starry night before going to 
bed.                                                       2.The sudden change in the night sky that we had been watching.Something very different. 
3.We more than likely thought it was a military type search light until we saw them coming in order, one after the other.
4.They came very fast at intervals,one after the other.They would go to a certain point,stop abruptly,hesitate briefly,then with tremendous speed they went on at about a 30 degree angle from where they came.
5.We were all amazed after we realized that they could not have been search lights because there was no beam from the ground what so ever.
6.The objects left our sight in a couple of seconds due to their speed.
content.summary: 5 people saw a number of luminous discs at night on a very clear night.

content.detailedDescription: I was closing the blinds looking out, there in tree level sight there was a huge red and white orb moving accross the tree. i watched it , called my son to look it was gone. i went to my back porch we looked but it never returned.
content.summary: A very bright red glowing object,blinking several times

content.detailedDescription:
It was approximately 10:30pm on saturday march 25th, i was driving home from work at which my shift ended at 10pm and it takes 15-20 min to drive home.  i turned off of sr43 onto sr225 and about 3 orange lights in the sky directly ahead and above me caught my attention.  they were kind of yellow-orange like a yellow traffic light and approximately the size of pea at arms length (approx 1cm in visual size).  

the lights did not seem to be moving except that the one left would fade out and then reappear on the right of the two remaining lights.  then the one that was now the left most light would fade out and thusly reaapear on the right of the two remaining lights.  i observed this for approximately 1 min while in the vehicle, and i turned into my driveway and hopped out of my vehicle to observe them for about 30sec to 1min more, but i lost line of sight to them as they moved behind the tops of the tree line across the street.  which was approximately in a westerly direction.

i was not sure what the lights were and was quite confused by them.  when i got into the house i described what i had seen to my room mate and his mother who have been around airplanes all their lives as her husband was a flight engineer, because i was not sure what i had seen.  they, being very skeptical of what i described, thought it was the lights on a plane at a strange angle to me but i was sure they were wrong.  on the following wed night he and his mother both observed the same lights in the sky as i did, and they too at this point were positive that it was not an airplane of any kind.
content.summary: Yellow lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking my two dogs outside to go to the bathroom when i noticed three bright lights.  my first thought was that it was an aircraft.  however the lights suddenly faded out.  i assumed that it was obscured by the tree so i moved further up the yard.  it was then that i saw an orange fireball.  i had seen one before several years ago and assumed that it was just a meteor striking the atmosphere.  however i suddenly felt it was out of place.  i called to my mother to come outside and went on looking for any other lights.  my mother came over and asked what was going on.  i told her what i had seen, and joked that she was going to think i was crazy.  we stared up at the sky for sometime and was about to go back inside when the three lights reappeared, followed by another set of three lights further to the north.  we were both shocked and a little disconcerted.  we have been around aircraft all our lives, since my father is a pilot.  however, we both knew this was no aircraft.  the lights remained on for a few seconds before they appeared to drop and fade out.  we could not hear any engine noise or see any solid shape.  the lights were very bright, and large.  this made is somewhat difficult to judge the distance.  we knew friends that live in that general direction so i called them.  i told her what we had seen, and she went outside.  we continued our conversation when suddenly the lights reappeared.  she was also shocked and said that the lights appeared to be slowly moving in a north eastern direction.
we remained outside for about twenty minutes, seeing another glimpse of these lights. i called another friend who also lived in that direction.  she was not that surprised and stated that last year, also during april, they were outside doing a program at wolf park.  in the middle of the program they also saw these lights.  many of the staff and members of the public saw them too. i have never been a beliver in this sort of phenomenon and am still not sure what we saw.  i did find it interesting that the lights were in the direction of grissom airforce base.
content.summary: A pair of three large, bright yellow lights in the sky. one fireball / meteor.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving southbound on i-95 between exits 8 and 7 in stamford ct at 2:24 pm. it was a cloudless sunny day. something caught my eye i glanced up to my left and saw an extremely bright stationary object at about a 10:00 position in the daylight sky. it was shockingly bright and round in shape approx 3/4 inch in diameter from my position in the driver's seat. it was as bright as light reflecting off a mirror. i thought it might be the sun reflecting off a plane, but it was too large, much too bright and a little too low to be an aircraft. to my relief, the brightness gave way to a flat and dull grey sliver shape. i had thought it was plane after all. i looked away for a 1/2 a second and when i returned to look at the object and it was completely gone from view - vanished. i searched the sky - nothing. in the farthest distance i could see the trails of an airplane.  i work for an airline and live in fairfield county where there are always planes overhead. it was very wierd. i'm still holding out for a logical explaination.
content.summary: Extremely bright light in daylight sky that quickly vanished

content.detailedDescription: We went fishing and saw it i went back next night and shot the thing but it was not of flesh but a strong light came from the bullet hole on the chest above the right brest the thing ran along an enbankment nothing could even walk on faster than i could run it was about seven feet tall hairy but the face looked like a ape.When the bullet hit it the thing looked right at me.A strong blue light come out.I never told anybody this but i still have bad dreams and i know this thing aint made of flesh nothing could take a 30 cal at that range or manover the way it did
content.summary: I shot something very strange

content.detailedDescription: My partner and i were riding our harley's just after breakfest, i noticed a bright reflection over a small swamp in haleiwa. when i looked up i saw a silver disc it was not moving so i called out to my partner to look up at it he did and as we were both staring at it it completely dissappeared before our eyes, the disc was only 200 yards away and about 500 ft up we got a good look it did not fly away it was just gone, so we pulled over right away and shut off the engines of our bikes to see if we could hear anything and stood there motionless for a few seconds no noise nothing. there was no obstructions to the view, i have been back there 10 times since it happened.I am not in the least supprised as i have believed in other life forms since i was 9 years old at an early age i took a real interest in ufo's and read all that i could find on the topic, just happy to say that i finally saw one with my own eyes.Any way we didnot say much after that i was confident that he saw what i saw, about a week later i called my riding partner and said that i never asked him that morning exactly what he saw, he then told me that he saw a silver disc just as i did. the disc was approx. 30 feet across
content.summary: Silver disc 250 yards away 500 feet elev.

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving my apt to walk the dog. i stepped out the door and saw this black blurry orb hanging in the air. it wasnt moving when i noticed it but as i looked at it ,it moved 10 feet over from between the telephone pole to the tree, just a little below the top of the tree and paused for a second and went a quarter way around the tree, rose about 15-25 ft higher and went off north west. after it went around the tree i ran inside for my camera and snapped a shot..
content.summary: Black orb 1.5 - 2.5 ft dia. looked kind of distorted around the edges

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside having a smoke on my back porch just looking up to the north east sky when from out ogf the horizion a series of round glowing light that moved in a deliberate formation caught my attention. i saw a row of 3 lights in the back and 2 more in the front formation. the back row was spaced evenely appart and while the 2 in the front row moves in a wavey pattern, or s shape but moved in the opposite direction from each other. this set of lights traveled quickly from horizion to horizion within 20 seconds. 

this is the formation i saw:

                0   0  0
                 0)  (0
the lights traveled across the sky west in a wavy pattern:
except the back row stayed in a straight formation;   the parenthesis show th direction the front lights were moving.
              o   o   o
                )   (
               (     )
                )   (
content.summary: As i was sitting outside at about 8:30 on a june evening , i looked up towards the sky approximately north east direction when above the horizion i saw 5 bright round lights in the sky in formation. there were 3 round light in the back row ,2 in front.

content.detailedDescription: I and my boy were hot tubing in the back yard. i was looking at orion and notice a movement of what at first looked like a whisp of a cloud. looking directly at it i new it was not natural and had a solid triangular body to it. i told my son to look at it, that it was a ufo. we watched it until the roof blocked the view. i then jumped out and ran in the house to tell another child to come see the ufo. we ran out the front and then i retreated to the house as i was naked and dripping wet from the hot tub. he later came to the back and said he had seen it too. (i had seen a simmilar craft about ten years ago 50 miles to the north. it was traveling north to south.)
content.summary: Object moved from south to north, was silent, large - width was about orionœ sholders -, it apeared triangular with a curved corona glow from right tip around the tip and trailed off the left tip.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking through my camera viewfinder with the full zoom on and spotted this object and took a picture of it. i was going to take several more photos of it but it disappeared quickly after i took the first picture. i continued searching the sky for several more minutes but the object was nowhere to be seen. there was not a cloud in the sky. i had the camera pointed almost straight up when i took the picture.I am enclosing the original and two enlargements.
content.summary: While searching the sky through my viewfinder i saw this object and snapped a picture

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work headin eastbond down route 5, between the towns of vernon and kirkville.  i first noticed the object because i saw 4 to 5 planes spraying chemtrails in the air.  looking head on the object (east), the object slowly descended and moved to my right.  it was shining in the sun so it was kind of hard to see.  then it stopped shining and it looked circular, but it was pretty distant so its hard to tell.  at first i thought it was just a plane descending, but then it stopped descending to the right and started moving more left.  i figured it proably just looked like it was moving left because i was driving and my car was moving.  but its movements did catch my attention.  i lost it along the treeline, only to have to become visible again as i kept driving.  this has been 1-2 minutes of driving so far.  it kept moving left, but its descent was much slower.  i lost visibilty again.  after another about 30 seconds, i gained visibility of a rather large plane in the vicinity of the objec t in question.  as far as i know the plane could have been the object.  however when i first clearly vieded the object, it was definetely circular in shape and metallic.  the object may have changed shape due to its change in trajectory.
content.summary: It was distant, metallic looking, glistened in the sunlight for a second.

content.detailedDescription:
In january, while in bed approximately 11:30pm e.S.T. i looked up as i always do to see stars. noticing a strobing flash, i didn't pay much attention thinking it was a comercial airliner which the white strobe strongly resembles. a few seconds passed when i glanced back in the vicinity of the strobe, when it occured to me that it hadn't moved. studying the strobe light more intensely now i pondered whether or not it could be a helicopter as it was stationary now for approx. 8 minutes. i went to get my nikon binoculars for a closer look. searching now for the tell tale sign of colored lights of some commercial craft as i thought for sure i would find. instead, i found that this object was much farther away than i first thought. binoculars also revealed that there were 3 0r 4 possibly 5 other strobing lights in the very same close vicinity as the bright strobing light although, the others were not as bright and only visible with the binoculars. i woke up my husband for a witness to what i was seeing. while observing these lights i also realized that the stars had moved considerably out of the window view (yes, i realize it was truely the earths rotation, not the stars) but that the lights were in the same place.  i watched these lights until around 2:00am when the cloud cover took over and i could no longer see lights or stars.
last night at approximately 10:00pm e.S.T. was laying in bed and turned off the tv. immediately looked up out my window to see stars. in the north country we've had what seems to be a straight month of clouds, but finally it was a bright starlit night, and to my absolute amazement, in the exact same place were the strobe lights. i watched for a few seconds and then told my husband to look. he witnessed the lights. this time there were also 4 or 5 white strobing lights although i could not tell which one was brightest because it seemed to me that they were taking turns being bright although i could not pick up a pattern. also, the strobing lights were visible with out the use of binoculars. still, i reached over for my binoculars because they help emensly with detail and i could see more clearly but still not enough to discern a definate shape. the best way to explain what i saw both times is that it looked like any other beautiful star lit night with the occasional flash of a airplane coursing through the night sky, although these do not move. 
i called my dad to see if he could see them from his window. he could not do to trees or some obstruction. i watched the lights until about 10:30 when the lights seemed to slowly get dimmer and dimmer as if they were moving farther and farther away. (note)the lights ever so slightly move in there position as if say a helicopter was hovering overhead. these lights were absolutly, positively very far away.
lisa cordwell
content.summary: Strobe light, very bright in southern sky

content.detailedDescription: I was about age 12 when i saw the disc shaped object. i was in a car with my mother and a friend of mine we were traviling west bound on s.W. 44th street and had just crossed over the santa fe railroad tracks when we were slowed by heavy traffic and police. the vehicle traffic was traveling very slowley and the police were directing the traffic because of the object. as we passed over the railroad tracks we looked to the right or to the north and saw the disc shaped object. it was about 250 yards from the roadway about 100 feet off of the ground. the object was about 100 feet in diameter with many multiple colored rotating lights. the object made no sound audible to me and had no movement other than the lights. there were many, many people who saw the same object that we saw including many police officers. we watched this object as long as we could, which was about two minutes because the traffic control moved us right along. i was amazed at what i saw, so were my mother and my friend. we didn't really know what we saw weather it was a military aircraft or a ufo but is was certainly something we had never seen before or since.
content.summary: I saw stationary object about 100 feet above the ground with rotating lights and no sound. no other movement.

content.detailedDescription: I was at our cabin on sage lake at hale ,mi at the south east side. i was letting out the dog at 11:00pm it was a very clear night. i observed what i initally thought was an aircraft with it's flashing light. but after 5 min or so i realized it had not moved. then i looked closer it was pulsating red, green, pink, violet, blue, yellow and white. i then observed it through 8 power bonoculars. that is when i called my wife out to see it. we both saw a cluster of lights flashing. i then set up my 80 power spotting scope and confirmed the separate lights that made it up. i took notes of what we saw. from my location it was 255deg. by about 10to 15 degs. up from the horizon. while observing it with the 80 powers scope. i noticed it was moving very slowly to the north. there were two aircraft passing by at the time probley within 20 mile of my location. the object appeared a great distance away but was as bright as a commercial airliners landing lights. i actually left me blinded as you would be if you were looking at a bright object in the dark then looked away. there was a light cloud cover that drifted in and i lost sight of it at 11:33pm. i went back into the house and after 10 minuts i looked again and it was still there. further to the north and not as brilliant but still plusating. i could not find it with my spotting scope but did with my binoculars. i have no idea what it was.
content.summary: Cluster of six lights surrounding center light  pulsating several different colors

content.detailedDescription: I reported this sighting some years back and never heard from mufon.  my wife and i both saw the "ufo" i called the local police and they had numerous call regarding the subject. i'm 72 now so i anyone is interested in talking to me or "us"  please get back to me.  we saw the ufo up close, tree top level  had quite an experience
content.summary: We observed a saucer shaped object, tree top heigth approximately 300 feet from our car, saw different colored windows circling the saucer, very dramatic.  we could believe what we saw and were hesitent to tell anyone including ouf family

content.detailedDescription:
In our house feeding the baby.
heard report on the rcmp scanner discribing the location of it.
i had seen it for a few minutes befor but had thought that it was a star.
have no idea.
it was over the old gondola ruins on mount hays. moving very slowly to the sw. it must hav been some great distance away.
called a friend who lived on the otherside of the mountain, he could not see it. then called my brother who lives just over a mile to the south of us, he could see it. i had left the baby in her crib and she got very unhappy so i went to comfort her, and it was gone when i got back. i took about a minute of vidio pictures of it but the autofocus seemed to keep losing focus and there seem to be very poor color to them.
content.summary: Flashing white, red & green light in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Had pulled into a shell gas station near ogalala, nb.
husband had gone into gas station for coffee, while  wit was sleeping in back of truck (accessible between cab and flatbed of pu truck).
wit was sleeping in the back of the truck.  sat up and looked out of the front/windshield and observed object. 
watched object for approximately 15 minutes (note: may have been indeterminatly longer, as this may have been a ce4 event).
husband came out of gas station, and wit pointed out object to him.  he got into truck, and started ignition.  drove off in opposite direciton.

note: husband had no apparent reaction to sighting of object.

wit watched object for about five minutes in rear window of truck as drove off.
lost sight of the object in the distance as truck drove off.

======================
note: wit described under hypnosis, a close encounter of the fourth kind.  she was taken aboard the craft.  there she encountered multiple entities.
she described the scene as somewhat of a "family reunion" with multiple adult humanoids and hybrid children.

sketch of adult being is attached.
sketch of object is also attached.
content.summary: Nebraska i80 truckstop ce1/ce4 - large hovering disk plus abduction

content.detailedDescription: It was 3:58 am fri morning march 24, 2006.  i was outside in my driveway walking down to get the morning paper.  i looked up into the sky, casually gazing at the stars when a moving object caught my attention.  i wondered if i was looking at a satellite moving across the sky because it seemed to be too high to be a jet of some sort unless it was a military craft that flew at very high levels.  anyway i stopped walking and watched it.  about 5 to 10 seconds after i stopped to watch it, the object grew in brightness and remained really bright for about 3 seconds then faded back to where it was previously.  i chuckled and said to myself something like well if this is another ufo then it is acknowledging me that it knows i am watching it.  casually i watched it as it kept on moving off in a general south eastern flight path.  after about 3 minutes or so, i couldn't track it due to trees so i stopped watching and went on to get the paper and go back inside the house.
content.summary: Was outside and looked up.  noticed object moving in a se direction and shortly after viewing it, it grew bright then faded back to orignial light. moved on off to the se.

content.detailedDescription:
Approx 9:10 on thursday march 23
i was driving west on county rd 900 in kosicosco county after dropping my kids off at there mothers home, at the time i was talking on the phone to my uncle when i noticed a strange blue light  to the east south east at first i thought it was a plane. there has been a lot of plane activity in the aria lately so i didn���t think anything of it. i drove down the road continuing to talk to my uncle and watching the strange light as we were talking i began to notice the light didn���t appear to be moving it seemed to be staying with me like the moon in the night sky when your driving at night. at this point i began to get this strange feeling and was telling my uncle about what was going on. i had been watching the light for approx 8 minutes. i was now in marshal county approx 2 miles from state rd 331 when things really got strange i was talking to my uncle and watching the light when suddenly my phone went dead, i looked down and my car stereo went on full volume to nothing but static, and all the gauges in my car were bouncing back and fourth erratically. then my car totally shut down. i hit the breaks to stop the car, looked out the windshield to look for the light and it was gone. i jumped out of my car to look around the sky to see if i could see the light and there was nothing in the sky. my car at this point came back on as nothing had ever happened, all the lights and gauges were functioning normally, the radio was back on the station i was listening to at normal volume, my cell which i had thrown to the passenger seat was now back on and functioning normally. i immeadely called my uncle back, my hole body was shaking at this point, and told him what happened. from his end he said a very loud pulsing sound rite before the phone cut to a busy signal. the time between calls was approx two minutes. needless to say i was really freaked out. later that evening i called the bremen police followed by the state police to see if anyone had reported any weird lights in the sky i told them what happened and they told me that no won had called but the had an officer in the aria and they would be checking it out.
content.summary: A srtange blue light that shut my car and cell phone down

content.detailedDescription: I was at my house, and i let my dogs out.  i noticed like a red sattlite floating, going paralle with earth's ground.  i saw the first one (i thought it was a plane, we get many over-head), and then a second one, i thought no-way, military!  the third one convinced me, this was no walk in the park, it scared me!  reason why is the 3rd flew in sequence, the sequence was so advanced that they approx. could have been about 100 miles apart.  i can't explain, for one, planes don't fly like what i saw.  they made no noise (the only noise i heard was from other planes, (almost like a roar or a swarm flying in after them?)).  it was weird, the three ships flew, but not that fast, at first.  i walked up the road still seeing them, like i could keep up, soon they disappeared way beyond an enviroment that was almost not noticeable, like a paradox or dimimesion, not of this earth.  i'm not saying they disappeared in a flash, it's that they seemed close, but could have been a hundred of miles away.  red, orange, and yellow is all the craft shown (mostley red), i don't know what it was, besides ufos.  many others would have seen it from miles around!
content.summary: Terrified as hell! (warof worlds)

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was at my window
2. when i was closeing the blind
3. airplain
4. it was going back and fourth
5. i was just staring athe object
6. when it took off
content.summary: It was moving in a straight line

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a readiness condition watch (midnight to 4am)on the ship's aft catapults. i went up onto flight deck and shortly noticed an odd "star" low off the aft quarter. it appeared larger and closer than any others and seemed to "bob" very slightly.  just before going back below, this "star" suddenly executed an extremely high-speed 3 legged manuever in the shape of a perfect figure "4" that went almost horizon to horizon in approximately 3 seconds, passing directly over the ship. i immediately reported the incident to the officer-of-the-deck.  he and i went back on deck where he soon witnessed further manuevring & then we quickly proceeded to the cic (combat information center)radar room.  the officer in charge of cic confirmed that four "unknowns" were present on radar at the time and commented they "had been trailing the ship for almost a week now". when queried by the od as to why we had not launched any aircraft to investigate a potential threat to the ship, the reply was that the craft had been recorded manuevering at speeds as high as 25 thousand mph and there simply was no point. i also recall that when the (very young) od asked why there were no entries of these events in the ship's log, he was informed that they had indeed been reported "through the proper channels" and that, "per standing orders", such events were never entered into the ship's official log.I  then returned topside and viewed all of the craft via the signal bridge binoculars for about another 30 minutes before having to return to my duty station.  they all appeared as solid metallic orbs with a band of softly flashing lights across their center that changed colors sequentially. while i do remember that there was a distinct and common pattern to the sequence of colors that appeared to rotate around each of these craft, i no longer recall the actual sequence.

note: at the time, the kittyhawk was attached to taskforce 77 and the flaghip for the 7th fleet and operating in the deep pacific, so i have no way of determining a precise location.  the ship was on it's way to the gulf of tonkin for a tour of combat duty in viet nam.  while the actual event is still quite vivid, i am uncertain as to the actual date (it may even have been the tour of 1965).  it was a long time ago and while i have previously related this information to several interested parties, this is the first time i have actually filed a formal written report of this incident. it had a profound effect on my thinking and eventually led to my participation in project visit, a not-for-profit texas based ufo investigative organization.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Uss kittyhawk, cva-63,  buzzed & followed by multiple craft

content.detailedDescription: Ask stan friedman for his comments on thomas & theresa morris the ones who are in contact with the ship=ufo
content.summary: Silver white light 30 x 30 silver disk like stealth but it's  a ufo as stan calls them
